In England, in the seven days to 12 December, there were 315,611 new confirmed cases (558.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 December, there were 285,526 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% (30,085 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 December is 9,503,176 (16,804.9 cases per 100,000 population).
